title: Wo Jia Da Shixiong You Dian Kaopu

synonyms: There's a Pit in My Senior Martial Brother's Brain 3
Our Big Brother's Mind Has A Problem 3
Wo Jia Da Shixiong Naozi You Keng 3rd Season
alternative_titles.en: What's Wrong with My Big Brother 3rd Season

synopsis:
Dongfang Xianyun, the big brother who finally recognized himself as the "big protagonist", fell into nothingness due to Dongfang Wuxian's misunderstanding. With the help of Bu Suantian, an envoy of the Tao of Heaven who was a time traveler, Dongfang Xianyun was forced to be reborn and once again involved in the battle between good and evil. The war intensified and everyone waited for Dongfang Xianyun's efforts to turn the tide, the big brother finally became reliable.

(Source: Bilibili)
